encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Meta: change Display Name to Fragment of Prose; add MP number 02797.840; add dimensions 17.9 x 2.9 cm; hand description 'upright, stylized bookhand'. Record in general notes that diacriticals were added where possible in the text. In the text, take out (?) as the tag alt serves the same purpose here. L. 10: add lenis over alpha in αριθμ; l. 12: there should be no accent over μ̣ὴ̣; l. 26: record ancient punctuation *high-punctus*; l. 27: record *dicolon*; l. 31: την αἰ̣τ̣ῆ: if would delete accent as there are various possibilities; τήν change accent to grave or delete it. Fine otherwise.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Meta: change Display Name to Fragment of Prose; add MP number 02797.840; add dimensions 17.9 x 2.9 cm; hand description 'upright, stylized bookhand'. Record in general notes that diacriticals were added where possible in the text. In the text, take out (?) as the tag alt serves the same purpose here. L. 10: add lenis over alpha in αριθμ; l. 12: there should be no accent over μ̣ὴ̣; l. 26: record ancient punctuation *high-punctus*; l. 27: record *dicolon*; l. 31: την αἰ̣τ̣ῆ: if would delete accent as there are various possibilities; τήν change accent to grave or delete it. Fine otherwise.
Submit - In order to prevent a Leiden+ error, I added the subtype "fragment" to verso. Please remove subtype="fragment" in the XML <div> tags after you are done revising the transcription.
